sentences.sContent: My corps ! your corps ! our corps ! maring corps !
sentences.sCn: 我的、你的、大家的海军陆战队！

sentences.sContent: The corps' corn in the corner is scorned by the stubborn corporation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The corps' corn in the corner is scorned by the stubborn corporation.
sentences.sCn: 军团在角落里的谷物受到了顽固的公司司（社团）的嘲笑。

synos.tran: 军团；兵种；兵队；（德国大学的）学生联合会

remMethod.val: corp(体) + s → 一个整体 → 军团

trans.tranOther: a trained army unit made of two or more  divisions (= groups of soldiers )
